title: Shaded outdoor play area, Covered lounging cabana with flat screen TVs
map_address: 18179 W. Terra Verde Place near Lost Canyon
posting_body: ['Self-Guided Onsite Tours Now Available!', 'At this time our team is available to schedule a self-guided onsite tour after a personalized virtual tour has been taken.', 'Please call us for more information!', 'Townhomes at Lost Canyon', '18179 W. Terra Verde Place, Santa Clarita, CA, 91387', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 29', 'OR Text', '29', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Serenity Just Minutes From the City', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1649 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'An all-new community for families and commuters alike, The Townhomes at Lost Canyon offer luxury townhouse-style living at a relaxed Santa Clarita Valley pace.', 'While at home, residents will enjoy a resort-like experience with access to world-class amenities.', 'The resort-style pool, and spa give new definition to lazy Sunday afternoons and evening stress relief.', 'The conveniently located pool lounge, barbecue area, playground, and dog park make entertaining a breeze.', '*', 'Townhomes will showcase spacious 3-bedroom, 2.5 bath floorplans with attached 2-car garages and high-end finishes, including designer wood plank flooring on the first level and walk-in laundry rooms on the second level.', 'The kitchens will evoke a chef-like ambiance with features including European-style, flat, panel cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and quartz counter tops.', 'Select townhomes will offer mountain views, an over-sized patio with outdoor fireplaces and a second private patio.', 'Features', '- Microwave', '- Spacious private patios*', '- Laundry rooms with full-size '- Ample closet space', '- Double-basin stainless steel sinks', '- Classic multi-speed ceiling fans in living rooms', '- Private master bedroom with Walk-in closets', '- Separate shower and tub in
